scripts.predeploy: ncp .next functions/.next && cd functions && npm install
scripts.deploy:mainnet: pnpm build:mainnet && pnpm predeploy && firebase functions:config:set deployment.network=mainnet && firebase deploy --only functions:nextjs-server-explorer-mainnet,hosting:explorer-mainnet && pnpm postdeploy
scripts.deploy:testnet: pnpm build:testnet && pnpm predeploy && firebase functions:config:set deployment.network=testnet && firebase deploy --only functions:nextjs-server-explorer-testnet,hosting:explorer-testnet && pnpm postdeploy
scripts.pages:build:mainnet:dev: cross-env NAME=explorer TARGET=dev_mainnet pnpm next-on-pages && ncp .vercel ../../dist
scripts.pages:build:testnet:dev: cross-env NAME=explorer TARGET=dev_testnet pnpm next-on-pages && ncp .vercel ../../dist
scripts.pages:build:mainnet:prod: cross-env NAME=explorer TARGET=prod_mainnet pnpm next-on-pages && ncp .vercel ../../dist
scripts.pages:build:testnet:prod: cross-env NAME=explorer TARGET=prod_testnet pnpm next-on-pages && ncp .vercel ../../dist
